item.title: Batch Size
item.description: Troubleshooting batch size issues Verify the expected batch size is sent in the query. Inspect the query sent to the server using command monitoring. Example using Ruby: irb(main):007:0> a['foo'].find.batch_size(5) => #<Mongo::Collection::View:0x860 namespace='admin.foo' @filter={} @options={"batch_size"=>5}> irb(main):008:0> a['foo'].find.batch_size(5).to_a D, [2021-02-10T21:30:25.137237 #16698] DEBUG -- : MONGODB | localhost:14400 req:10 conn:1:1 sconn:502 | admin.find | STARTED | {"find"=>"foo", "filter"=>{}, "batchSize"=>5, "$db"=>"admin", "lsid"=>{"id"=><BSON::Binary:0x780 type=uuid data=0x83044920080f4adc...>}} D, [2021-02-10T21:30:25.138153 #16698] DEBUG -- : MONGODB | localhost:14400 req:10 | admin.
